nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET browserTransactionName SINCE 1 week ago LIMIT 25
SELECT average(duration) as 'Avg Page Load', percentile(duration,50) as 'Median', percentile(duration,95) as 'Percentile', uniqueCount(session) as 'Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT histogram(duration, 7, 100) FROM PageView FACET browserTransactionName SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView TIMESERIES 1 hour SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM PageView since 60 minute ago until 10 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago

SELECT average(duration) AS 'Average Page Load Time', median(duration) AS 'Median Page Load Time', percentile(duration, 95) AS '95th % Page Load Time' FROM BrowserInteraction TIMESERIES SINCE 86400 seconds ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT percentile(duration,50),percentile(largestContentfulPaint,50) From PageView,PageViewTiming SINCE 3 days ago TIMESERIES 1 hour
SELECT latest(duration)/1000 as 'Load Time' FROM SyntheticCheck FACET locationLabel SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT percentage(count(*),WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck FACET monitorName SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET deviceType SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET countryCode SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET userAgentName SINCE 1 week ago LIMIT 5
SELECT percentile(duration,50) from PageView FACET deviceType SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(duration,50) from PageView facet countryCode TIMESERIES SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT percentile(duration,50) from PageView facet userAgentName TIMESERIES SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT median(duration) from PageView FACET browserTransactionName since 24 hours ago TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*) as '# Pages',average(duration) as 'AVG',percentile(duration,50,75) as '%',average(domProcessingDuration) as 'DOM Proc',average(pageRenderingDuration) as 'Pg Render' FROM PageView  facet browserTransactionName SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 50
SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM PageView since 1 hour ago FACET city LIMIT 20

SELECT count(*) as '# Pages',average(duration) as 'AVG',percentile(duration,50,75) as '%',average(domProcessingDuration) as 'DOM Proc',average(pageRenderingDuration) as 'Pg Render' FROM PageView facet userAgentName,userAgentVersion SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(duration) from PageView facet userAgentName,userAgentVersion since 24 hours ago TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*) as '# Pages',average(duration) as 'AVG',percentile(duration,50,75) as '%',average(duration - backendDuration) as 'Front',average(backendDuration) as 'Back',average(domProcessingDuration) as 'DOM Processing',average(pageRenderingDuration) as 'Page Rendering' FROM PageView  facet pageUrl SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 30
SELECT count(*), average(duration) FROM PageView FACET session LIMIT 100

SELECT pageUrl,duration,(duration - backendDuration) as 'Front',backendDuration as 'Backend',domProcessingDuration,pageRenderingDuration as 'Page Rendering' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 300 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET asnOrganization LIMIT 25 SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT average(((totalTime OR duration OR 0) + (queueDuration OR 0) OR 0) * 1000) AS 'Response time', average((queueDuration OR 0) * 1000) AS 'Request queuing', average((externalDuration OR 0) * 1000) AS 'Externals', average((gcCumulative OR 0) * 1000) AS 'GC', average((((totalTime OR duration OR 0) - (externalDuration OR 0) - (databaseDuration OR 0) - (gcCumulative OR 0)) OR 0) * 1000) AS 'Application time' FROM Transaction TIMESERIES SINCE 86400 seconds ago EXTRAPOLATE
